response.job_title: Disaster Risk and Natural hazards - Geoinformation Science |  Civil engineer (Geotechnics)
response.summary:
MSc in Applied Earth Sciences/BEng. Civil Engineer

Experience in:
- Physical climate risk analysis  (Disaster Risk reduction)
- Multi-hazard modelling under changing scenarios as climate change using LISEM, python, pcRaster and GEE
- Design disaster Risk reduction structural and Nature base solutions measures I Exploratory cost-benefit analysis
- Site selection for roads, pipelines, aqueducts and waste disposal sites
- Leading and restructuring teams

Skills
- Integration of multidisciplinary knowledge to solve complex problems
- High initiative and commitment with Sustainable Development goals
- Inquisitive and creative mind
- Tech with purpose
response.skills: Critical Thinking, Self Learning, Creative Problem Solving, Communication, Strategy, Leadership, Disaster Risk Reduction, Natural hazards, Project Coordination, Data Analysis, Engineering, Earth Observation, Hydraulics, Geotechnical Engineering, Geographic Information Science, Research and Development (R&D), ILWIS, Python (Programming Language), Technical Writing, PcRaster- For Environmental modelling

profile_positions.description:
- Lead content creation for PLAXIS FE software. Responsible for definition of team strategy, workflows and  target achievement.

- Main Editor and product owner of PLAXIS manuals and tutorials.   Slope stability analysis, water flow in soils & multi hazard-risk.

- Lead data management for PLAXIS documentation, automation of PLAXIS documentation processes.  

- Maintenance automated routines for PLAXIS engineering case studies/tutorials. Contributor commands signatures and objects redesign for PLAXIS automation.  

- Evaluating potential application of combining Geotechnical and Flood modelling Bentley platforms for multi-hazards risk analysis. Bentley platforms involved (PLAXIS - OpenFlows).
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Content development - Geotechnical for PLAXIS FE

profile_positions.description:
- Lead  content creation team & product owner PLAXIS documentation.
- Development and review of the technical and scientific documentation for the Finite Element software PLAXIS (geotechnical design) | Review of consistency of software modelling results.
- Coordinating the integration PLAXIS documentation to Bentley systems workflows | Implementation of new platform for PLAXIS documentation and data base structure creation.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Content development  - Geotechnical (PLAXIS- Finite Elements)
Civil Engineer for Technical and Scientific documentation (PLAXIS)

profile_positions.description:
- Evaluation of consistency and translation of geological, geotechnical and mining studies for environmental licensing.
- Supporting CAPEX development to attract foreign investment in energy projects.
profile_positions.title: Civil engineer - Supporting Energy energy projects

profile_positions.description:
This program has the purpose of promoting a greater participation of candidates with academic excellence in COLFUTURO and potential impact in the future of Colombia.

The process for the election of the candidates of the Talent Seeding is highly rigorous and is focused on academic excellence and in the leadership qualities of the candidate, considering criteria such as the position held in the undergraduate program and the grade point aggregate, among other academic merits and acknowledgements.
profile_positions.title: Talent seeding awardee

profile_positions.description:
Auditing the geotechnical exploration and designs for the improvement of the Strategic Colombian waterway to avoid flooding and guarantee transport functionality. 
More info: https://coastalsolutions.ireport.royalhaskoningdhv.com/12001001A1
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineer

profile_positions.description: Survey  and assessment (Aerial & remote sensing & in-situ) of Natural Hazards  jeopardizing the strategic Colombian Oil&Gas pipeline (Caño Limón-Coveñas). Assuring the quality of conceptual and detailed geotechnical designs for pipeline protection. Assuring the fulfilment of environmental and social regulations.
profile_positions.title: Profesional IV - Integrity Engineer

profile_positions.description: Developing field surveys, GIS & Remote analysis and natural hazard evaluation for pipeline route selection. Conceptual and detailed design of Geoenvironmental structures to protect poor communities and vital infrastructure affected by natural hazards (mass movements, flooding and erosion).
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineer

company.name: Seequent
company.description:
Seequent builds world-leading subsurface software, helping create a better understanding of the earth to ensure a better world for all. 
  
We are constantly evolving at the forefront of technology to transform how geo-professionals work, eliminating barriers to understanding by connecting software, teams, and the tools they need. 
  
Every day, our customers in over 100 countries work to develop mineral resources more sustainably, design and build better infrastructure, protect the environment, source renewable energy, and help resolve historical challenges such as groundwater contamination and ageing infrastructure. 
  
Our integrated earth modelling, geo-data management, and team collaboration software enables them to see a more complete picture of the earth: because with more understanding comes better decisions – for people and the planet. 
  
Headquartered in New Zealand with global reach, Seequent is the specialist subsurface software company within Bentley Systems. Together, we are helping build a more resilient world.
